argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_recn | |- ( x e. RR -> x e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_readdcl | |- ( ( x e. RR /\ y e. RR ) -> ( x + y ) e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | #P_renegcl | |- ( x e. RR -> -u x e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | #P_1re | |- 1 e. RR |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_cnsubglem | |- RR e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` CCfld ) = ( .g ` CCfld ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-refld | |- RRfld = ( CCfld |`s RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` RRfld ) = ( .g ` RRfld ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_subgmulg | |- ( ( RR e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) /\ N e. ZZ /\ A e. RR ) -> ( N ( .g ` CCfld ) A ) = ( N ( .g ` RRfld ) A ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_mp3an1 | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ A e. RR ) -> ( N ( .g ` CCfld ) A ) = ( N ( .g ` RRfld ) A ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ A e. RR ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ A e. RR ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 13 |  | #P_cnfldmulg | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ A e. CC ) -> ( N ( .g ` CCfld ) A ) = ( N x. A ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ A e. RR ) -> ( N ( .g ` CCfld ) A ) = ( N x. A ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ A e. RR ) -> ( N ( .g ` RRfld ) A ) = ( N x. A ) ) |
